title: VeloSoleX Advert
content:
hi all,

anyone can identify the font used in the logo and subline/copy?

i'm not sure but the logo might be hand drawn? for the rest of the text, i know i've seen that "r" before, but i can't remember. the one in those black circles also looks different from the one used in the subline. any ideas?

thanks: lars
